titleStmt.title: The House of Commons, upon late information received from their armies in Ireland, have tenderly considered the great extremities they are in ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: "27. August. 1644. Ordered that this order be forthwith printed and published, and carefully dispersed: Hen. Elsynge, cler. Parl. D. Com."
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
